text: Traude Dierdorf (17 November 1947 – 1 January 2021) was an Austrian politician. In 1997 she was elected first mayor of Wiener Neustadt. In 2005, she resigned for health reasons.Traude Dierdorf neue Ehrenbürgerin von Wiener Neustadt Dierdorf was a member of the Social Democratic Party. Dierdorf died on 1 January 2021, at the age of 73.Wiener Neustadts Alt-Bürgermeisterin Traude Dierdorf gestorben ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Austrian politicians Category:Mayors Category:People from Lower Austria
title: Traude Dierdorf
